condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Appointment of a Technical Auditor for the MSC | Description :The Recipient shall appoint, no later than fourmonths after the Effective date, an external technical auditor to carry out annual audit of the Management Service Contract, underterms of reference acceptable to the Association. | Due Date : May 31, 2015.

Finance Agreement :Appointment of an external auditor (finance) | Description :The Recipient shall appoint, no later than sixmonths after the Effective Date, an external auditor to carry out annual audit services for the Project, under terms of referenceacceptable to the Association. | Due Date : July 31, 2015

Finance Agreement :Section I.A(1) of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement. | Description :The Recipient, through the MEH, shallestablish, not later than four (4) months after the Effective Date, and thereafter maintain throughout Project implementation, theProject Steering Committee to be responsible for the suitable oversight of the Project, and composed of representatives of the MEHand the Recipientâ€™s Ministry of Finance and Economic Planning, Ministry of Budget, Ministry of Plann | Due Date :15-Nov-2018

Finance Agreement :Section I.C(2) of Schedule 2, to the Financing Agreement | Description :The Recipient shall cause the Operatorto maintain employed under the Management Services Contract and throughout its implementation period, qualified and experience keyexperts in number and with qualifications satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Section I.C(3) of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement. | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than ten(10) months before the expiration of the Management Services Contract, conduct an assessment of the different options availableleading to a decision for the future governance of EDG after the expiration of the Management Services Contract | Due Date:31-Dec-2018

Finance Agreement :Section I.E(4) of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement | Description :The Recipient shall, every three (3)months, collect, compile and furnish, as part of the Project Report, reports on the status of compliance with the SafeguardsInstruments. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Section I.F(1) of Schedule 2, to the FA and Section C.1-Schedule of PA | Description :The Recipient shall causeEDG to produce and disclose, and EDG shall produce and disclose, not later than June 30 of each fiscal year, throughout projectimplementation, annual consolidated audited financial statements, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association and inaccordance with international accounting standards. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Section I.F(2) of Schedule 2, to the Financing Agreement | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than six(6) months after the effective date, adopt the financial restructuring plan of EDG in form and substance satisfactory to theassociation. | Due Date :15-Jan-2019
